div.p:
Annual-mean present-day dust loading ( a), and the surface temperature change in ( b) 6 ka and ( c) 9 ka when this dust is completely removed. Only the changes that are significant to the 5% level (calculated by two-tailed student-t test) are shown. The zonal-mean temperature change in ( b, c) are shown in ( d, e), respectively. Figure generated using NCL
46 .
